text:
Hi Cesare, open the page in a new page, right click and inspect element, check the Css, and copy the  css for for the dot, then in settings go to pages , and put it as display none.
If you don't know how to code I can help you remove it

Hi <@U05R380MLMC> Thanks for the quick response and interaction. In this flow theory that I proposed, this idea is relevant, but separately, as we have more than 100 flows that can create tickets. So taking into consideration what you said, it seems like the solution would be this

About of API requests , we use them very close to this because of extractions we do on other fronts, hence the concern with quotas
